channel.title: Camelot Pk Is Back - Pistol Pete - Spawn PK
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://img137.imageshack.us/img137/4026/camelotpkbanner.png[/img] [img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4224/cpkbanner.png[/img]
[b][Fixed 12/26/13] [img]http://s4.postimage.org/31ieldkkk/webclient.png[/img][url=http://uppit.com/jwyt91d6y0w1/Camelot_Pk_Client.jar]Play Now [Direct JAR][/url] [img]http://s4.postimage.org/31ieldkkk/webclient.png[/img][url=http://uppit.com/nzn9sg0pagqb/Camelot_Pk_Client.zip]Play Now [.ZIP][/url] [img]http://s4.postimage.org/31ieldkkk/webclient.png[/img][url=http://www.petegaming.tk/webclient.html]Play Now [Webclient][/url][/b]
--------------------------------------------- [b][img]http://s2.postimage.org/1w9wq8ulg/259ye89.gif[/img] Features[/b] [i][b]- ::pure - ::master - ::item[/b][/i] 100% Runescape XP Bar 614 Look, Less Lag Perfect Switching Amazing Combat Few Known dupes patched Clipped Following Clipped Combat 634 items. 633 characters. 602 anims including Korasi. 508 maps & objects. New hitmarks like rs Including Criticals. 602 Npc's & Skilltab Fast loading client. Low client memory usage. Full working Curses Items kept on death interface New Shop interface New Bank interface New RS Loading Bar/Login Box/Background New Skill Tab w/ hovering New Freinds list/Ignore list
[center] [img]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/6811/25playersonline.png[/img]
[img]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/5480/22playersonline.png[/img]
[img]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/4281/server4k.png[/img]
[img]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/1395/edge1f.png[/img]
[img]http://img805.imageshack.us/img805/1461/varrock4.png[/img]
[img]http://img576.imageshack.us/img576/6150/varrock2.png[/img]
[img]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/6844/ags1.png[/img]
[img]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/2180/server5l.png[/img]
[img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/9168/lootli.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/3623/dds1.png[/img]
[img]http://img607.imageshack.us/img607/7048/server2.png[/img]
[img]http://img43.imageshack.us/img43/1867/agsb.png[/img]
[b][u]NEED CLIENT TO PLAY [/u] [Fixed 12/26/13] [img]http://s4.postimage.org/31ieldkkk/webclient.png[/img][url=http://uppit.com/jwyt91d6y0w1/Camelot_Pk_Client.jar]Play Now [Direct JAR][/url] [img]http://s4.postimage.org/31ieldkkk/webclient.png[/img][url=http://uppit.com/nzn9sg0pagqb/Camelot_Pk_Client.zip]Play Now [.ZIP][/url] [img]http://s4.postimage.org/31ieldkkk/webclient.png[/img][url=http://www.petegaming.tk/webclient.html]Play Now [Webclient][/url][/b]
- Thank You Pistol Pete[/center][/CENTER]
